Extract.ExtractDescription: IP21 Line 8 Filler Data - 18 tags 5 minute period - Weekly Run
Extract.ExtractString: SELECT NAME, TS, VALUE FROM HISTORY WHERE TS BETWEEN '&STARTDT' AND '&ENDDT' AND PERIOD = 3000 AND NAME IN('23034794.BATCH.RTIME.PV','23034794.FILL.RM.HUM.PV','23034794.FILL.RM.TEMP.PV','23034794.GROSS.WEIGHT.PV','23034794.MIX.RM.HUM.PV','23034794.MIX.RM.TEMP.PV','23034794.NET.WEIGHT.PV','23034794.PROD.TEMP.PV','23034794.PROP.SU.PRES.PV','23034794.PROP.WA.PRES.PV','23034794.RECIR.FLOW.PV','23034794.RECIR.PRES.PV','23034794.RECIR.VES.PR.PV','23034794.RECR.PMP.PRS.PV','23034794.RECR.PMP.SPD.PV','23034794.RECR.PRD.TMP.PV','23034794.TARE.WEIGHT.PV','23034794.VESSEL.PRES.PV')

Extract.ExtractDescription: IP21 Line 8 Filler Data - 18 tags 5 minute period - Daily Run
Extract.ExtractString: SELECT NAME, TS, VALUE FROM HISTORY WHERE TS BETWEEN '&STARTDT' AND '&ENDDT' AND PERIOD = 3000 AND NAME IN('23034794.BATCH.RTIME.PV','23034794.FILL.RM.HUM.PV','23034794.FILL.RM.TEMP.PV','23034794.GROSS.WEIGHT.PV','23034794.MIX.RM.HUM.PV','23034794.MIX.RM.TEMP.PV','23034794.NET.WEIGHT.PV','23034794.PROD.TEMP.PV','23034794.PROP.SU.PRES.PV','23034794.PROP.WA.PRES.PV','23034794.RECIR.FLOW.PV','23034794.RECIR.PRES.PV','23034794.RECIR.VES.PR.PV','23034794.RECR.PMP.PRS.PV','23034794.RECR.PMP.SPD.PV','23034794.RECR.PRD.TMP.PV','23034794.TARE.WEIGHT.PV','23034794.VESSEL.PRES.PV')

SELECT b.mat_desc as material_description, a.mrp_mat_id, a.mrp_batch_id, to_char(a.mfg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as mfg_dt, to_char(a.last_goods_receipt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as last_goods_receipt_dt, a.sample_status, a.test_status, a.long_test_name, a.short_test_name_level1, a.short_test_name_level2, a.short_test_name_level3, a.data_type, a.test_instance, a.replicate_id, a.recorded_text, a.reported_value, a.recorded_value, a.test_result_uom, to_char(a.test_end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as test_date, a.trend_flag, a.instrument_id, a.sample_disposition, a.test_disposition, a.result_number, a.method_id, a.test_id, a.component_id, a.test_result_type, a.test_result_datatype FROM gdm_dist.vw_lift_rpt_results_nl a, gdm_dist.vw_merps_material_info b WHERE a.mrp_mat_id=b.mat_cod AND UPPER(a.test_status)='APPROVED' AND UPPER(a.site_name)='ZEBULON' AND b.plant_cod='US01' AND a.mrp_mat_id in('10000000076065') AND a.test_end_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('&STARTDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('&ENDDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY a.mrp_batch_id, b.mat_desc, a.long_test_name

SELECT b.mat_desc as material_description, a.mrp_mat_id, a.mrp_batch_id, TO_CHAR(a.mfg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as mfg_dt, TO_CHAR(a.last_goods_receipt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as last_goods_receipt_dt, a.sample_status, a.test_status, a.long_test_name, a.short_test_name_level1, a.short_test_name_level2, a.short_test_name_level3, a.data_type, a.test_instance, a.replicate_id, a.recorded_text, a.reported_value, a.recorded_value, a.test_result_uom, TO_CHAR(a.test_end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as test_date, a.trend_flag, a.instrument_id, a.sample_disposition, a.test_disposition, to_char(CASE when a.result_number=0 THEN null ELSE a.result_number END) as result_number, a.method_id, a.test_id, a.component_id, a.test_result_type, a.test_result_datatype, b.no_of_doses_size, b.prod_strength FROM gdm_dist.vw_lift_rpt_results_nl a, gdm_dist.vw_merps_material_info b WHERE a.mrp_mat_id=b.mat_cod AND UPPER(a.test_status)='APPROVED' AND UPPER(a.site_name)='ZEBULON' AND b.plant_cod='US01' AND a.mrp_mat_id in('10000000094129','10000000094130','10000000094131','10000000094132','10000000094133','10000000094134','10000000094135','10000000094123', '10000000094124','10000000094125','10000000094126','10000000094127','10000000094128','10000000094117','10000000094118','10000000094119', '10000000097334','10000000097335','10000000097336','60000000003256','60000000004088','10000000097337','10000000107766','10000000107768', '10000000118073','10000000118074','10000000118075') AND a.test_end_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('&STARTDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('&ENDDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY a.mrp_batch_id, b.mat_desc, a.long_test_name

Extract.ExtractComment: Used by older pre-GDM database change LIMS transforms
Extract.ExtractDescription: MERPS material codes and dates via ODS prcs_ord_header
Extract.ExtractString: SELECT DISTINCT prcs_ord_num, TO_CHAR(actual_start_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as actual_start_dt, mat_cod, prcs_ord_desc, bat_num FROM gdm_dist.vw_merps_prcs_ord_header WHERE UPPER(plant_cod)='US01' AND actual_start_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE('&STARTDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('&ENDDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY bat_num

Extract.ExtractComment: US01 batch and materials used by transforms
Extract.ExtractDescription: MERPS material codes and dates via GDM material_info and material_batch
Extract.ExtractString: SELECT a.mat_cod, b.bat_num, a.mat_desc, a.prod_strength, a.prod_brand_name, TO_CHAR(b.mfg_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as mfg_dt, TO_CHAR(b.last_goods_receipt_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as last_goods_receipt_dt, no_of_doses_size FROM gdm_dist.vw_merps_material_info a, gdm_dist.vw_merps_material_batch b WHERE a.mat_cod=b.mat_cod and UPPER(a.plant_cod) = 'US01' AND mfg_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE('&STARTDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('&ENDDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT DISTINCT R.SampId, R.SampName, R.ResStrVal, R.SampCreateTS, S.SpecName, S.DispName, V.Name, V.DispName as DispName2, SS.SampStatus, PLS.ProcStatus, R.ResLoopIx, R.ResRepeatIx, R.ResReplicateIx FROM ZBLN_ACT_CHEMLMS.ProcLoopStatVw PLS, ZBLN_ACT_CHEMLMS.ResultVw R, ZBLN_ACT_CHEMLMS.SampleStatVw SS, ZBLN_ACT_CHEMLMS.VarVw V, ZBLN_ACT_CHEMLMS.SpecnameVw S WHERE R.SampId IN (SELECT R.SampId FROM ZBLN_ACT_CHEMLMS.ResultVw R, ZBLN_ACT_CHEMLMS.VarVw V WHERE R.ResStrVal in ('10000000047840') AND R.SpecRevId=V.SpecRevId AND R.VarId=V.VarId AND V.Name='PRODUCTCODE$') AND R.SampCreateTS BETWEEN TO_DATE('&STARTDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('&ENDDT','DDMONYY:HH24:MI:SS') AND R.SpecRevId = S.SpecRevId AND R.SpecRevId = V.SpecRevId AND R.VarId = V.VarId AND R.SampId = SS.SampId AND R.SampId = PLS.SampId AND R.ProcLoopId = PLS.ProcLoopId AND SS.CurrAuditFlag = 1 AND SS.CurrCycleFlag = 1 AND SS.SampStatus <> 20 AND PLS.ProcStatus >= 16 AND ((V.TYPE = 'T' AND R.ResReplicateIx <> 0) OR (V.TYPE <> 'T' AND R.ResReplicateIx = 0)) AND R.ResSpecialResultType <> 'C'
